不孕症治疗与产后心脏病风险增加有关罗格斯健康中心专家对超过 3100 万份医院记录进行的一项研究表明，接受不孕不育治疗的患者在产后一年内因心脏病住院的可能性是自然受孕患者的两倍。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240516/Infertility-treatment-linked-to-higher-postpartum-heart-disease-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240516/Infertility-treatment-linked-to-higher-postpartum-heart-disease-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7f036ca9-aeba-41a0-affe-a7e4e43a14d9 Thu, 16 May 2024 14:17:55 -0400 Infertility treatment linked to higher postpartum heart disease risk
重新利用人类批准的药物来治疗朊病毒病朊病毒是可传播的异常致病因子，能够诱导特定正常细胞蛋白质的异常折叠。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240516/Repurifying- human-approved-drugs-for-prion-disease-treatment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240516/Repurifying- human-approved-drugs-for-prion-disease-treatment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0eab8040-e709-47bd-80c1-35e2f58e2747 Thu, 16 May 2024 14:02:55 -0400 Repurposing human-approved drugs for prion disease treatment

CONVINCE 试验揭示了长期服用秋水仙碱对复发性中风和心血管事件的影响今天（2024 年 5 月 15 日）在 2024 年欧洲卒中组织会议 (ESOC) 上公布的国际 CONVINCE 试验显示，长期秋水仙碱抗炎治疗并未降低非心源性卒中患者的卒中复发率和心血管事件发生率在主要意向治疗分析中。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240516/CONVINCE-trial-reveals-the-effect-of-long-term-colchicine-on-recurrent-中风-and-cardioangio-events.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240516/CONVINCE-trial-reveals-the-effect-of-long-term-colchicine-on-recurrent-中风-and-cardioangio-events.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fa66b99a-03d3-45e8-af55-3a405abdcfdc Thu, 16 May 2024 13:39:06 -0400 CONVINCE trial reveals the effect of long-term colchicine on recurrent stroke and cardiovascular events
Huc-MSCs 在治疗急性肝衰竭中作用的机制见解急性肝衰竭（ALF）是一种危及生命的临床问题，治疗选择有限。施用人脐带间充质干细胞 (hUC-MSC) 可能是治疗 ALF 的一种有前途的方法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240516/Mechanistic-insights-into-the-role-of-huc-mscs-in-treating-acute-liver-failure.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240516/Mechanistic-insights-into-the-role-of-huc-mscs-in-treating-acute-liver-failure.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=54832d54-f5db-4266-98cb-e25aaecab9b3 Thu, 16 May 2024 13:25:01 -0400 Mechanistic insights into the role of huc-mscs in treating acute liver failure

临床试验表明高血压自我管理策略可能有效控制血压研究结果表明，与常规护理相比，高血压的自我管理策略可以在 24 个月内有效降低血压水平，而不会增加医疗资源利用率或不良事件。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240516/Clinical-trial-suggests-hypertension-self-management-strategies-may-be- effective-to-control-blood-Pressure.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240516/Clinical-trial-suggests-hypertension-self-management-strategies-may-be- effective-to-control-blood-Pressure.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b02d0680-d50e-4c17-abdb-fd3a1f387009 Thu, 16 May 2024 11:10:00 -0400 Clinical trial suggests hypertension self-management strategies may be effective to control blood pressure
